content:
Craft an item of type: gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 18}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 50, "index": 43}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft gray_terracotta, I need to craft gray_dye which requires placing 1 black_dye and 1 white_dye side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the black_dye from slot 17 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 18}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 50, "index": 43}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: Since the black_dye has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the white_dye to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the white_dye to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 2, "index": 0}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 13, "index": 18}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 22}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 50, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the gray_dye by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 2

thought: To craft gray_terracotta, I need to place 8 terracotta in the crafting grid and then add a gray_dye in the center. I will start by moving one terracotta into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1
